Refactoring
- Brief description

Purpose
- What improvement this achieves and why

Context
- Current code problems
- Business/technical drivers

Current State
- Existing structure and issues

Target State
- Desired structure and outcomes

- Pattern: where and how to apply
- Pattern: where and how to apply

Constraints to Maintain
- Backward compatibility, existing APIs, performance constraints

Behaviour Preservation
- Explicit list of behaviours that must not change

Testing Requirements
- Test types and coverage requirements

Before/After Structure Example
- Before: brief description
- After: brief description

Edge Cases
- Case to handle during refactoring

Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Criterion
- [ ] All existing tests pass

Rollback Considerations
- How to revert if problems arise

Non-Functional Requirements
- Maintainability, performance, reliability
